description:
This course covers how to get started with Microsoft Outlook 2013. Students will learn how to navigate the Outlook interface, perform basic email functions and learn how to access the help system. This course is taught by Sandra Batakis.

Total Video Time: 45 minutes

Enjoyed what you saw? What to learn more about Microsoft Office Outlook 2013?

Check out the full Microsoft Office Outlook 2013 - The Basics training course.
title: Outlook 2013 - Getting Started
